attributes.action: turn the lights back on in colchester we all need to be safe
attributes.additional_details: we need the lights back on in colchester so people can be safe.thanks
attributes.background: we need the lights back on in colchester so people can be safe.thanks

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Street lighting in your local area is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
